author: Zephyrkul (Zephyrkul#1089)
install_msg:
Thanks for loading OneTrueSlash! Your one and only slash command will show in all servers your bot has applications.commands permission for within an hour after syncing.
Note that you will have to sync the associated command on your own.
This cog has no commands beyond the one true slash command.
**This cog is not yet complete.** No warranty is provided for any damage this cog may cause.
name: OneTrueSlash
short: Add the one and only slash command you will ever need to your bot!
description: Add the one and only slash command you will ever need to your bot!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
